FuncDef: The display acl service-group command displays the user-based ACL that is applied to a specified or any service group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service group.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

Examples: The following ACL match service-group test:
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Multiple rules in a user-based ACL can be applied to a user group. This command can be used to display the UCL that is applied to a service group.
Multiple rules in a user-based ACL can be applied to a service group. To display the user-based ACL that is applied to a specified or any service group, run the display acl service-group command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
